short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: How many cookies do you have?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tracks how many cookies you accept while browsing the web - whoever accepts the most cookies by 1pm on May 3rd, 2021 wins 100lbs of IRL cookies! This is MSCHF drop #45 You will need to log in with your email in order to win.

Who stole the cookies from the cookie jar? Let’s find out!

FEATURES:
> Tracks how many cookies you accept
> Leaderboard across all players
> One player wins 100lbs of cookies

PRIVACY: Cooooookies stores your email (which you input on signup) and tracks your browser cookies for the purpose of counting them. Your email and your numerical score are shared so we can show your place on the leaderboard. All cookie data is only stored locally on your computer. We don’t collect, track, or share it.
